scenes.background: Monica shakes her head, looking at her watch.
scenes.description: Bob says, Lets not rush into things without considering all aspects.

options.text: We need to ensure every detail is covered, even if it takes more time.
options.analysis: You emphasize the importance of detailed planning, demonstrating good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: I see the urgency, but a thorough plan will help us avoid future problems.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the urgency but stress the need for a detailed plan, showing empathy and perception.

options.text: Maybe we can find a middle ground where we move quickly but also carefully.
options.analysis: You suggest a compromise, balancing the need for speed with careful planning, showing empathy and social skills.
